M

map(double, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
the value within the interval of [originMin,originMax] will be at the same location relative to the new interval [rangeMin,rangeMax] as result example:
map(value=20, originMin=0, originMax=40, intervalMin=0, intervalMin=20) will result in 10
map(value=20, originMin=0, originMax=40, intervalMin=0, intervalMin=100) will result in 50
map(value=3, originMin=3, originMax=4, intervalMin=0, intervalMin=100) will result in 0
map(value=3, originMin=2, originMax=4, intervalMin=50, intervalMin=100) will result in 75
mass - Variable in class fast3d.util.AVec
the mass of what is to move (the higher the mass, the less strong forces result in speed) - only for new added forces

Material(Color, Color, Color, Color, double, double) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.light.Material
initiates the materials data, no texture
material - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
the lighting-color information of the triangles surface
MathUtil - Class in fast3d.util.math

MathUtil() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
 
MatrixCalculation - Class in fast3d.math
Calculation Class for static usage
a matrix is a 2dim- double-array with mostly/preferred a same length of first and second dimension
a matrixes height is the length of the first dimension, it's width the second dimensions length
the second dimensions length has to be the same for all of the first dimensions entries
MatrixCalculation() - Constructor for class fast3d.math.MatrixCalculation

moveInAbsoluteDirection(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Rectangle

moveInAbsoluteDirection(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Triangle

moveTo(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Line
the parameter-vector is along the constant x,y,z-axes

moveTo(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Pixel
moves the pixel so that it will be at the target
moveTo(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Rectangle

moveTo(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Triangle

MtlLibLoader - Class in fast3d.util.serial
to load an *.obj file it is necessary to declare the used coloring-data as materials in a separate file
MtlLibLoader() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.serial.MtlLibLoader
 
mul(double[][], double[]) - Static method in class fast3d.math.MatrixCalculation
m is (y X x) - matrix. m.length==y , m[0].length==x
multiplies the given vector-coordinates with the matrix as defined mathematical
the matrixes dimensions length has to equal the length of the given vector-array
mul(double[][], Vector3d) - Static method in class fast3d.math.MatrixCalculation
a faster way for a vector-instance to be multiplied and not to generate an array of its coordinates
the matrixes dimension length has to be 3
MultiControl - Class in fast3d.control
a very easy to use control: add all the controls you want to apply to a Panel3d to the filed subControls and than add this control to the Panel3d
at onActivate() all subControls are activated (equivalent at onDeactivate())
at performInput() all controls are asked to perform their input
the call to the subControls is in the order, specified by the list
by call activate() you activate all subControls (similar to deactivate())
the built-in simple controls do not work together because they override the entire camera-positioning every frame -- controls used by MulitControl should be designed to work together
MultiControl(Control...) - Constructor for class fast3d.control.MultiControl
constructs a plain MultiControl that does nothing but call it's subControls
MultiControl(List<Control>, boolean) - Constructor for class fast3d.control.MultiControl
constructs a plain MultiControl that does nothing but call it's subControls
multiply(Vector2d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
multiplies the coordinates of the parameter to the coordinates of this
does not change the parameter
multiply(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
multiplies the coordinates of the parameter to the coordinates of this
does not change the parameter
multiply(Vector4d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
multiplies the coordinates of the parameter to the coordinates of this
does not change the parameter
MultiThreadPanel3d - Class in fast3d.mtOpt
A Panel3d that can render on multiple threads
MultiThreadPanel3d(Universe) - Constructor for class fast3d.mtOpt.MultiThreadPanel3d
